title: How to Attract a Virgo Man As a Taurus Woman

steps.title: The grounded Virgo wants a woman who’s down-to-earth.
steps.content: The grounded Virgo wants a woman who’s down-to-earth. He’s a mutable sign, which means he’s drawn to depth. He’s more interested in your wits, kindness, and perceptiveness than your looks. Show him that you aren't superficial by keeping your look simple and natural. You can do things like: Wear outfits that are more comfortable and cute rather than flashy and trendy. Choose a natural makeup palette that complements your hair, skin, and eye color. One small, delicate piece of jewelry, like a pair of earrings, will catch his eye. Reader Poll: We asked 554 wikiHow readers, and 74% of them said that when you're dressing to impress a Virgo man, it's best to keep it simple by wearing classic, fitted clothing styles. [Take Poll] So in short, other readers agree that you shouldn't go for glamorous, dramatic outfits (instead, try a simple white button down with your favorite dark wash jeans!).

steps.title: An observant Virgo notices everything around him.
steps.content: An observant Virgo notices everything around him. [1] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Whether you grab a napkin for someone who’s spilled coffee, point out a bluebird in the sky, or discuss a line of poetry you just love, he’ll be impressed. Bond over the little things that most people miss and he’ll be entranced. Also, listen closely to little details that he mentions. For example, if he says he loves live music one day, see if he wants to see a concert with you a few weeks later. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Virgos are social and want a charming partner on their arm.
steps.content: Virgos are social and want a charming partner on their arm. [3] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019. Prove that you can mingle with anyone in any setting, from a sophisticated party to a low-key get-together. Show a strong interest in anyone you meet, hold a conversation no matter where it goes, and leave on a high note by saying goodbye to everyone. Your Virgo will take notes about how you make such a great impression. He’s ruled by Mercury, so your Virgo analyzes people and notices how they feel. [4] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. As a Taurus, your ruling planet is Venus, making you highly sensitive about anyone you meet. Together, you’re likely to win anyone over.

steps.title: A Virgo is a natural diplomat, so he wants to know your perspective.
steps.content: A Virgo is a natural diplomat, so he wants to know your perspective. As a mutable sign, he can change the way he looks at the world—ultimately, he just wants to understand people and situations better. Provide a fun challenge and give him a taste of your Taurus stubbornness. [5] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. For example, stand your ground on a topic and he’ll be impressed. Virgo and Taurus balance each other out and grow as individuals when they consider each other’s viewpoints—your Virgo encourages you to be more open-minded, while you encourage him to speak up for himself. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Virgos crave the solid foundation of friendship before romance.
steps.content: Virgos crave the solid foundation of friendship before romance. Since he’s not one to let go of his inhibitions and throw himself into passion right away, reassure him that you just want to learn more about him. He’ll appreciate that you want a strong mental connection and are willing to explore your chemistry later. Spend lots of time with him in public and bring him to events he expresses interest in, like an outdoor concert. He won’t feel like your romance is rushed. Text him regularly to check up on him and just to ask about what’s on his mind. Luckily, as a Taurus, you’re all about the slow and steady path. Your heart opens up to another earth sign easily, and you make sure to build a tight bond with anyone you’re attracted to. [7] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021.

steps.title: He wants to see how you click on a personal level without distractions.
steps.content: He wants to see how you click on a personal level without distractions. A Virgo is really logical, so he knows that a romantic atmosphere can make anyone sentimental. Show that you’re sincere and sure of the special magic you two share—instead of extravagance, keep it simple. Whether it’s a walk in the museum or a spontaneous picnic, he’ll enjoy that all you need is each other to have a good time. Remember to bring some Venusian charm and creativity even if it’s low-key—for example, you can put on a signature scent that he’ll never forget or bring him over for cocktails after a cheap dinner. [8] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021.

steps.title: The compassionate Virgo needs a lot of empathy in return.
steps.content: The compassionate Virgo needs a lot of empathy in return. Out of all the zodiac signs, he’s an absolute angel who thrives on treating people well. Treat him to a ton of TLC so that he can recharge. Hear him out when he’s had a hard day, ask how you can support him, and remind him that you’re always there for him. When he learns he found a woman that’s as warm as he is, he’ll melt. It’s rare to find a pairing as gentle and loving as a Virgo and a Taurus—you’re both incredibly loyal and always notice when your partner needs extra affection, so you’ll build a strong level of safety with each other. [9] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021.

steps.title: Help him with a cause—this earth sign is a huge humanitarian.
steps.content: Help him with a cause—this earth sign is a huge humanitarian. [10] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. A Virgo will take you more seriously and be smitten with your big heart if you lift others up. Discuss values or missions that matter the most to you two, such as protecting the environment. Then, offer a way to make a positive difference, like cleaning up a beach. He’ll start to fantasize about how you’d both change the world. Use a holiday as an opportunity to support others. For example, you can serve food at a soup kitchen as a unique way to celebrate. Also look for possibilities to pitch in on a regular basis, like helping out at an animal shelter every other weekend. This “trick” helps you bond with him and soothe your own soul since you’re so invested in your community. You’ll both get a glimpse of your long-term potential as you work side-by-side.

steps.title: This lovable perfectionist always strives to be better.
steps.content: This lovable perfectionist always strives to be better. Mercury drives a Virgo to expect more out of himself each and every day. [11] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019. Check in about his short-term and long-term goals, then suggest ways you can pitch in. If you make it clear that you’re on his side and would never stand in the way of his grand vision, he’ll adore you. As earth signs, you’re both highly practical and determined—instead of having your heads in the skies, you’re focused on what you can accomplish right now.

steps.title: It isn’t easy for him to be vulnerable, so he needs you to protect him.
steps.content: It isn’t easy for him to be vulnerable, so he needs you to protect him. [12] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Let him open up about his past and any other sensitive matters on his own time. Then, deeply engage with any topic he brings up and express how moved you are. End the heart-to-heart by telling him that you’ll guard any information he trusts you with. You both want a lover who can be your confidante, so these emotional chats can help your relationship evolve. [13] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019.

steps.title: He wants to take his time so the connection feels special.
steps.content: He wants to take his time so the connection feels special. Virgos are gentle spirits who take passion seriously and aren’t casual at all. Start off slow—stick to long chats, big hugs, and pecks on the cheek. Eventually, he’ll tell you when he’s ready to explore a more sultry dynamic. You also earn his respect when you hold back and let him take the lead. A discussion about his boundaries and needs also endear him to you. Your Venusian beauty will definitely tempt him and create some fun tension.
